p: As discussed earlier, besides decreasing the serum levels of OVA-specific IgE, shikonin ( 1) was also observed to significantly decreased ( p < 0.05) the serum levels of IL-4 and significantly increased ( p < 0.05) the serum IFN-γ level ( Wang et al., 2017). Previous study has reported that increasing the IFN-γ level and reducing the IL-4 level in the blood could alleviate the pathological lesion of AR in rats ( Li et al., 1996). These findings indicated that the mechanism of shikonin attenuated AR may also involved reducing the level of IL-4 and increasing the level of IFN-γ in the body ( Wang et al., 2017).
